channel.title: Comments on: Decisions for Heroes a finalist in SeedCamp

item.title: By: Gordon
item.dc:creator: Gordon
item.description: Yup, Hopefully. Unless I can make eWrite so bloody big I can buy the whole Seedcamp project and bring it to Ireland to fund only Irish services.
item.content:encoded: Yup, Hopefully. Unless I can make eWrite so bloody big I can buy the whole Seedcamp project and bring it to Ireland to fund only Irish services.

item.title: By: Anthony Galvin
item.dc:creator: Anthony Galvin
item.description:
Hearty congrats to D4H - I think its a great idea, and I also think its a cool idea.
ClubW.tv also applied and got PFO'd. What the hell, its another learning experience.
Has Ireland got the critical mass required to carry off one of these events. I have no doubt that it has. Ideas, technology, drive, capital - despite what many say, it is my experience that there is plenty of all about at the moment.
What we are missing is leadership. Should Enterprise Ireland organise this? A private person/group? A college? It doesn't matter - We still need one person to drive this, at first anyway.
Oh, just in case anyone is confused, I am not that person.
item.content:encoded:
Hearty congrats to D4H – I think its a great idea, and I also think its a cool idea.

ClubW.tv also applied and got PFO’d. What the hell, its another learning experience.

Has Ireland got the critical mass required to carry off one of these events. I have no doubt that it has. Ideas, technology, drive, capital – despite what many say, it is my experience that there is plenty of all about at the moment.

What we are missing is leadership. Should Enterprise Ireland organise this? A private person/group? A college? It doesn’t matter – We still need one person to drive this, at first anyway.

Oh, just in case anyone is confused, I am not that person.

item.title: By: Conor O'Neill
item.dc:creator: Conor O'Neill
item.description: And commiserations to you and the others, Gordon. Hopefully next year!
item.content:encoded: And commiserations to you and the others, Gordon. Hopefully next year!

item.title: By: Robin Blandford
item.dc:creator: Robin Blandford
item.description:
Cheers Conor.
Looking forward to meet Lenny & Fergus over here during the week too.
item.content:encoded:
Cheers Conor.

Looking forward to meet Lenny & Fergus over here during the week too.
